colophons: Colophon The name of the scribe is recorded on foll. 27 a and 66 a, and more fully on fol. 51 a, Yeshūa' bar Phetion . ܨܠܘ ܥܠ ܕܣܪܛ ܝܫܘܥ ܒܫܡ ܕܝܪܝܐ ܕܡܬܝܕܥ ܒܪ ܦܬܝܘܢ
